other resources to learn about ggstatsplot

Indrajeet Patil

2021-03-07

Source: vignettes/web_only/other_resources.Rmd
other_resources.Rmd

Below is a collection of blogposts or other documents that talk about different functions included in ggstatsplot.

Presentation

  • https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/ggstatsplot_slides/slides/ggstatsplot_presentation.html#1

Blogs

  • https://anevaluator.com.au/2019/12/exploratory-data-analysis-into-machiavellianism/

  • https://ibecav.netlify.com/post/comparing-frequentist-bayesian-and-simulation-methods-and-conclusions/

  • https://www.dsquintana.blog/labeling-boxplot-outliers/

  • https://paulvanderlaken.com/2018/08/26/ggstatsplot-creating-graphics-including-statistical-details/

  • https://medium.com/yulun-ding-ambassador/ggplot-ch1-3-ways-to-present-discrete-vs-discrete-in-graph-7cbcbbfa4803

  • https://www.r-bloggers.com/how-to-remove-outliers-in-r/

  • https://yury-zablotski.netlify.app/post/boxplot/#fn3
